speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m contacting you regarding an overdue balance on your account with Global Finance. Can I have your full name to proceed?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Sarah. You have a balance of two hundred fifty dollars. When can we expect payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I need a little more time. Can I pay next week?

speaker: Agent
text: I can note that down. Just to confirm, would you like to set a date for next week?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, I have scheduled your payment for next Friday. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that’s all for now. Thank you.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your time, Sarah. Have a good day!
